content:
WGM Agenda?

assuming no call this week can we talk about this at WGM? :

https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/196008-ig-publishing.20requirements/topic/9.2F7.2F2021.20agenda

I think that discussion is overdue, so yes. And perhaps we can discuss other issues
@Eric Haas you could create a branch and we can test it before merging

I would like to know what we decide before committing to a branch. In the past I created a parameter to define the what displayed by the SD liquid template as a default, currently is the summary. It can be that simple, but I imagine that we may want to reorder the tabs or get rid of the summary tab altogether.
